meanings.definition: In a thoroughgoing manner; completely or thoroughly.
meanings.sent1: She cleaned the house thoroughgoingly, leaving no corner untouched.
meanings.sent2: He studied for the exam thoroughgoingly to ensure he understood all the material.
meanings.sent3: The detective searched the crime scene thoroughgoingly, even checking under the smallest objects.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her work was thoroughgoingly impressive, like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The chef seasoned the dish thoroughgoingly, creating a perfect balance of flavors.

meanings.definition: To the fullest extent; in every respect.
meanings.sent1: They thoroughgoingly explored the forest, discovering hidden paths and wildlife.
meanings.sent2: The team decided to thoroughgoingly analyze the data before making any conclusions.
meanings.sent3: The children thoroughgoingly decorated the classroom for the teacher's birthday, using every available decoration.
meanings.sent4: His passion for music thoroughgoingly consumed him, leading him to practice for hours every day.
meanings.sent5: The artist thoroughgoingly painted the mural, covering every inch of the wall with vibrant colors.
